0: Lazy people, do a little work and think they should be winning, but winners, work as hard as possible and still worry if they're being lazy.
1: Every decision you make is not a decision about what to do. It is a decision about Who You Are. When you see this, everything changes. You begin to see life in a new way. All events, occurrences and situations turn into opportunities to do what you came here to do.
2: You don't have to be extreme, just consistent.
3: No has de ser el mejor absorbiendo información. Has de ser muy bueno librándote de la basura informativa.
4: What comes easy, won't last. What lasts won't come easy.
5: M.O.N.D.A.Y: Maybe it's not One of your favourites but Never forget every Day you wake up is an Amazing gift and it's up to You to make it count!.
6: Desarrollar una habilidad en algo como el ajedrez puede resultar valioso: proporciona un conjunto de estructuras neuronales que son similares a las necesarias para aprender matemáticas y ciencias.
7: Enorgullécete de quien eres, especialmente de las cualidades que te hacen diferente, y úsalas como un talismán secreto para el éxito.
